products.title: Harper Linen Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Harper linen roman blind in cream. Made to measure from 23.65 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern.
 
 Product id: db-rom0946 fabric colour: linen material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Harper, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Harper, rainbow - roman blind with a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contr
products.productdescription: With a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contrast between the zesty oranges and calmer pinks. A light blue feature wall and a light brown laminate floor are great ways to introduce this symphony of colour into the living room. Keep your other surfaces simple and calm and your blinds are sure to take centre stage.  Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Harper, Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Harper, burnt orange - roman blind this beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light
products.productdescription: This beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light blue that really help set the tone. The living room will transform itself into the heart of the home when you pair this offering from the harper range with some light blue walls and a selection of orange and yellow accessories. Ideal for extending your colours across the room.  Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Harper Aubergine
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure harper aubergine deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality deluxe roman blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
